plot: When a boy disappears from home his mother enlists the aid of two ex-lovers by telling each that he is the boy's father.
title: Lao dou wu pa duo
plot_es: When a boy disappears from home his mother enlists the aid of two ex-lovers by telling each that he is the boy's father.
plot_en: When a boy disappears from home his mother enlists the aid of two ex-lovers by telling each that he is the boy's father.

produce.name: Ko Chi Sum Films Company Limited
